title: I am in class 4. I always top in my class. Can I get AIR 1 in the JEE Advanced? - Quora

response.answer_text: First if you have realised the importance of education at such a small age CONGRATULATIONS you can make impossible things possible, you can get that kind of success that maybe no person has ever achieved Kid In this world you cannot do crazy things alone . You must have to create leadership skills so to get that You must master any language (preferably English) By mastering a language you can show your emotions better and understand any problem better than any one , 2nd things you need to do is acquire exceptional observation and imagination ,you can get this just by asking questions to yourself Now lets go your topic you want 1st position in jee advanced Well in maths ,you should be able to visualise it when you think about any problem ,its a skill that comes from doing above things When you find about any formula ,you must be able to visualise that formula e.g lets say now you know that 2+3= 2+2+1. Now try to visualise this by thinking about about a Scale or a seesaw in playground think that you have add 2 candies on one side and 2 on another side of scale and then you add 3 more on one side and add only 2 on another and then finally 1 candy in side where only 4 candies exist. Play with this imagination in your imagination Try another symbol like greater than or lower than Try using different objects in your imagination You will figure out the basic idea of algebra Now you have to think about a unit any unit you like cm,inch,feet ,mm Visualise a 2D box with 2 same side imagine that how many boxes do you need to make different shapes ,you will soon realised that you can do this in 3D with other shapes You must also study science with same method With imagination in mind and observations in real life Always try to remember or learn new names of everything with spelling it will help you alot in exam Finally don't just study Visualise your (that is given to you by your teacher amd book)knowledge in your imagination and try to observe the knowledge that you already have Pro tips Do selfstudy Make habbit of solving problems Note down every method that you will develop on your own in your next 8 years Note even the method of how you think Never loose your curiosity(you will complete your school education before you will even reach 12 th standard but you must continue with internet ) If you do just this once you reach 12th standard you will be on completely different level than any human in India

YOU CAN ! but remember , not because u get 1st rank in class 4. if there was some other kid , to him also i would have told the same thing . ao a list of things i would suggest to u is go for icse education till class 10 and cbse in class 11–12, it will be very very very easier for u to do things in class 11 and 12 cbsedevelop good work ethics, study everyday , play everyday, excercise everyday, do some hobbies, practice honesty and integrity , eat healthy, meditate everyday, and try to do everything in smarter way rather than in a harder way.in every forthcoming class you have to understand everything in science and math. your basics till class 10 have to be clear before you finally come to class 11.once you reach in class 6, start solving rs agrawal or rd sharma or such books. if u complete it in samw class only , proceed to higher class books directly.participate in competitive olympiads , rmo, kypy , nstse , ntse etcu can join institutes like fiitjee , they have batches from class 5.read science encylopdeas or articles to develop more intereststay away from social media, make a lot of frnds but dont get influenced by other useless activities, dont get into relationships when u grow up until u clear the examand dont worry for now. just develop your skills slowly and steadily. happiness is very important , so enjoy the subjects.believe you can , and you will
